Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt

Interface DisplayMediator

public interface DisplayMediator

Interface implemented by the central display controller

Makes the link between the Model (Player and RumourCardsPile) and the View (StdView and GuiView).

Specifies a set of methods which must be redefined to achieve all cases where a display associated with a Model's component has to be shown.

See Also:
DisplayController, InputMediator

  • Method Details

    • displayPlayTurnScreen

      void displayPlayTurnScreen​(String playerName)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the beginning of a turn.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player starting their turn.
      See Also:
      Player::playTurn

    • displayAccusationScreen

      void displayAccusationScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player accusator, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player accused)

      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the accusation of a player by another.

      Parameters:
      accusator - the player who accused.
      accused - the player who got accused.
      See Also:
      Player::accuse(Player)

    • displayChooseDefenseScreen

      void displayChooseDefenseScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the choice of an answer to an accusation.
      See Also:
      Player::defend()

    • displayForcedToRevealScreen

      void displayForcedToRevealScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the case where someone is forced to reveal their identity.
      See Also:
      Player::forcedReveal()

    • displayIdentityRevealScreen

      void displayIdentityRevealScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the case where someone reveals their identity.
      Parameters:
      p - the player revealing their identity.
      See Also:
      Player::revealIdentity()

    • displayScoreUpdateScreen

      void displayScoreUpdateScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p, int points)
      Requests the DM to notify the view of a change in a player's score.
      Parameters:
      p - the player earning or loosing points.
      points - the algebric value of the score update.
      See Also:
      Player::addScore(int)

    • displayEliminationScreen

      void displayEliminationScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player eliminator, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player victim)
      Requests the DM to notify the view of the elimination of a player by another.
      Parameters:
      eliminator - the player responsible for the elimination
      victim - the player who is eliminated
      See Also:
      Player::eliminate(int)

    • displayLastUnrevealedPlayerScreen

      void displayLastUnrevealedPlayerScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when there is only one unrevealed player left.
      Parameters:
      p - the last unrevelead player

    • displayNoCardsScreen

      void displayNoCardsScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has no playable cards left.
      Parameters:
      p - the player who has no more playable cards.

    • displayCard

      void displayCard​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard rc, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display a single Rumour Card with its Witch, Hunt and additionnal effects.
      Parameters:
      rc - the Rumour Card to be displayed.
      forcedReveal - if false, the cards properties will be hidden if it is unrevealed.

    • displayWitchEffect

      void displayWitchEffect​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display a single Rumour Card with its Witch effect.
      Parameters:
      rc - The rumour card of which we want to display the Witch effect.

    • displayHuntEffect

      void displayHuntEffect​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display a single Rumour Card with its Hunt effect.
      Parameters:
      rc - The rumour card of which we want to display the Hunt effect.

    • displayCards

      void displayCards​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCardsPile rcp, boolean forcedReveal)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a pile, with all their characteristics.
      Parameters:
      rcp - a pile of Rumour Cards.
      forcedReveal - if false, the unrevealed Rumour Cards' properties will remain secret

    • displayWitchEffects

      void displayWitchEffects​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a pile, with their Witch effects.
      Parameters:
      rcp - a pile of Rumour Cards.

    • displayHuntEffects

      void displayHuntEffects​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a pile, with their Hunt effects.
      Parameters:
      rcp - a pile of Rumour Cards.

    • showCards

      void showCards​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to display all Rumour Cards within a player's hand.
      Parameters:
      p - the player of whose hand we want to display
      See Also:
      HumanPlayer::showHand()

    • displaySelectCardScreen

      void displaySelectCardScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a card.

    • displaySelectUnrevealedCardScreen

      void displaySelectUnrevealedCardScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a card among unrevealed cards only.

    • displaySelectRevealedCardScreen

      void displaySelectRevealedCardScreen()
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player has to select a card among revealed cards only.

    • displayPlayerPlaysWitchEffectScreen

      void displayPlayerPlaysWitchEffectScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player player, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the use of the Witch effect of a Rumour Card by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player triggering a Witch effect.
      rc - the Rumour Card of which the Witch effect is triggered.

    • displayPlayerPlaysHuntEffectScreen

      void displayPlayerPlaysHuntEffectScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player player, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the use of the Hunt effect of a Rumour Card by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - : the player triggering a Hunt effect.
      rc - the Rumour Card of which the Hunt effect is triggered.

    • displayHasChosenCardScreen

      void displayHasChosenCardScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player player, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard chosen, boolean forceReveal)
      Requests the DM to notify the view when a card is taken by a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player taking a card.
      chosen - the Rumour Card taken by the player.
      forceReveal - if false : the taken Rumour Card's name and properties will remain hidden.

    • displayNoCardsInPileScreen

      void displayNoCardsInPileScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCardsPile rcp)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a players polls the pile, the latter one is empty.
      Parameters:
      rcp - the common pile of discarded cards.

    • displayDiscardCardScreen

      void displayDiscardCardScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player owner, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard rc)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player discarded one of its Rumour Cards.
      Parameters:
      owner - the player discarding the Rumour Card.
      rc - the Rumour Card discarded by the player.
      See Also:
      Player::discard(RumourCard)

    • displayLookAtPlayersIdentityScreen

      void displayLookAtPlayersIdentityScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player me, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player target)
      Requests the DM to display the screen corresponding to the situation when a player secretly looks at another player's identity.
      Parameters:
      me - the player looking at the target's identity.
      target - the target whose identity is being looked at.
      See Also:
      Player::lookAtPlayersIdentity(Player)

    • secretlyDisplayIdentity

      void secretlyDisplayIdentity​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player target)
      Requests the DM to display the identity of a player victim of an effect allowing a player to look at it.
      Parameters:
      target - the target whos identity has been secretly looked at.

    • displayPlayerHasResetCardScreen

      void displayPlayerHasResetCardScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player player, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards.RumourCard chosenCard)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player has taken back one of their revealed cards.
      Parameters:
      player - the player taking back one of their revealed cards.
      chosenCard - the card that the player will be able to use again.

    • displayTakeNextTurnScreen

      void displayTakeNextTurnScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player has taken the next turn.
      Parameters:
      p - the player taking the next turn.
      See Also:
      Player::takeNextTurn

    • displayPlayTurnAgainScreen

      void displayPlayTurnAgainScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player is authorized to play one turn again.
      Parameters:
      p - the player taking another turn.
      See Also:
      Player::playTurnAgain

    • displayForcedToAccuseScreen

      void displayForcedToAccuseScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player theOneWhoMustAccuse, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player theOneWhoForcedThem)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player was forced to accuse another player.
      Parameters:
      theOneWhoMustAccuse - the player who got forced to accuse a player.
      theOneWhoForcedThem - the player forcing their target to accuse any player but them (if possible).
      See Also:
      Player::forceToAccuseNextTurn(Player)

    • displayStealCardScreen

      void displayStealCardScreen​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player thief, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player stolenPlayer)
      Requests the DM to notify the view that a player took a Rumour Card from the hand of another player.
      Parameters:
      thief - the player who took the Rumour Card.
      stolenPlayer - the player whose Rumour Card has been taken.
      See Also:
      Player::takeRumourCard(RumourCard,Player)

    • passLog

      void passLog​(String msg)
      Deprecated.

      Requests the associated display mediator to log a message.

      Used for debugging.

      Parameters:
      msg - a String.

    • displayPossibilities

      void displayPossibilities​(fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions.Menu possibilities)

      Given an instance of Menu, resquests the DM to display its title and its choices.

      This method only manages the display of that Menu, user input is obtained using InputMediator::makeChoice.

      Parameters:
      possibilities - an instance of Menu
      See Also:
      Menu

    • freezeDisplay

      void freezeDisplay​(int duration)
      Deprecated.
      abandonned with the GUI's development

      Requests the DM to pause the view for a given duration

      Initially meant to be used to mark a short break between each CPU player's actions.

      Parameters:
      duration - the duration of the pause in milliseconds

    • displayStrategyChange

      void displayStrategyChange​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p, fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies.PlayStrategy strat)
      Deprecated.
      Initially meant to be used for debugging and improving the AIs' behaviour
      Requests the DM to notify the view of a change of strategy by a CPU player
      Parameters:
      p - the player who changed their strategy
      strat - the strategy newly chosen

    • displayRanking

      void displayRanking​(fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player p)
      Requests the DM to display the players' ranking with their current score.
      Parameters:
      p - the (human) player requesting to display the ranking.
      See Also:
      HumanPlayer::showRanking()
